sentence.text: While these expansions occur in coding and noncoding regions, microsatellite sequence and repeat length diversity is more prominent in introns with eight different trinucleotide to hexanucleotide repeats, causing hereditary diseases such as myotonic dystrophy type 2 (DM2), Fuchs endothelial corneal dystrophy (FECD), and cell killingorf72 amyotrophic lateral sclerosis and frontotemporal dementia (C9-ALS/FTD).
